channel.title: R on Liga de Políticas Públicas UFSM
channel.description: Recent content in R on Liga de Políticas Públicas UFSM

item.title: Mapas com geobr
item.description: Blablabla Pacotes necessários library(tidyverse) library(geobr) sm<-read_municipality(code_muni = 4316907) escolas<-read_schools() escolas<-escolas %>% filter(name_muni == "Santa Maria", abbrev_state == "RS") ggplot()+ geom_sf(data = sm, size=.5)+ geom_sf(data = escolas)+ theme_minimal() ggplot()+ geom_sf(data = sm, fill="#2D3E50", color="orange", size=.5)+ geom_sf(data = escolas, color = "orange")+ theme_minimal() Com leaflet library(leaflet) library(tidyverse) leaflet(escolas) %>% addTiles() %>% addMarkers(popup =~paste("<B>Nome:</B> ", name_school, "<br>", "<B>Dependência Administrativa:</B> ", admin_category, "<br>"), label = ~name_school) {"
